page.title: 20Recreation - Hobbies
page.content: Hassall Green School was used as a source of information on the recreations enjoyed by the community as a whole. The School and Church organise many of the events that take place in the village. May Day with maypole dancing and May Queen. Bingo sessions organised by the school. School Parents Association organise events and coach trips, an opertunity for mothers to get together. Ladies Circle meets at the Church and makes money for the Church while sharing talents and crafts. Other organised leisure pursuits take place outside the villiage. Cubs, Brownies, Guides and Scouts in Wheelock. Some children attend Alsager and Smallwood youth club. Children go swimming to Alsager and Sandbach Leisure Centre. 1 boy plays football in Sandbach Heath. Some parents enjoy gardening and DIY.
